message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SD

This paper proposes a technique for improving generative RNNs, which are commonly used in natural language processing and computer vision tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves training a backward network and using it to improve the forward network's ability to model long-term dependencies, which suggests a focus on machine learning and neural networks. This makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also mentions a speech recognition task and a COCO caption generation task, indicating a focus on audio and visual data, respectively. This makes cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.SD (Sound) possible sub-categories as well.
